meanings: an underhand scheme, an underlying motive, a secret design

vlive.korean: 무슨 꿍꿍이인데? What are you up to? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 필독) 트렌디하게 불륜남녀 조지는 법 [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.03
뭐지? 왜 다 가입했지? 무슨 꿍꿍이들이지 다들? What is it? Why did everyone register?? Are you guys planning something??? 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] 돌아와! 아직 안 끝났어!
vlive.english: What is it? Why did everyone register?? Are you guys planning something???

vlive.korean: [무슨 꿍꿍이를...?] [What's up your sleeve...?] View video 정세운(Jeong Sewoon) : [LUCKY TV] EP.29 LISTEN TO MY V HEARTBEAT!
무슨 꿍꿍이냐고요? What am I trying to pull off? 듣기 View video JBJ95 : [#지금하95]100꿍
vlive.english: What am I trying to pull off?

vlive.korean: [승용차팀의 꿍꿍이(?)를 알 리 없는 두 사람] 잘 다녀오세요~ [These two don't know their plan] See you there! 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : <우리 아빠가 생겼어요3> 8회
vlive.english: [These two don't know their plan] See you there!

examples.korean: Everyone is being very secretive—there’s something cooking. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 모두가 너무 비밀스러워. 무슨 꿍꿍이가 있는 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Everyone is being very secretive—there’s something cooking. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Beware of Greeks bearing gifts. He must have a secret design. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 적이 베푸는 친절은 의심해야 해. 그에게 꿍꿍이가 있음이 틀림없어. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Beware of Greeks bearing gifts. He must have a secret design. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He must have some trick up his sleeve. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 앤 뭔가 꿍꿍이속이 있는게 틀림없어. Neungyule
examples.english: He must have some trick up his sleeve. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: What's up your sleeve this time? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이번엔 또 무슨 꿍꿍이속이야? Neungyule

examples.korean: I cannot quite see his motive. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 무슨 꿍꿍이속인지 도무지 모르겠다 Neungyule
